metadata.title: CVE-2014-7947 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: OpenJPEG before r2944, as used in PDFium in Google Chrome before 40.0.2214.91, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via a crafted PDF document, related to j2k.c, jp2.c, pi.c, t1.c, t2.c, and tcd.c.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '40.0.2214.94-0ubuntu1.1120').
openjpeg2 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.1-1').
